name: 俞旗文
objective:
修習本課程宜具備土壤力學、岩石力學、工程地質基本概念。大地工程包含土壤工程、岩石工程及工程地質。高等大地工程(二)主要課程單元包括
(1)Rock Material and Rock Mass
(2)Stress and Strength
(3)Deformability and Strength
(4)Identify Unstable Rock Slope 
(5)Identify Unstable Rock Tunnel
(6)Rock Engineering Design
(7)Case Studies。
schedule:
W1) Introduction
(W2,3) Rock Material and Rock Mass
(W4,5) Stress and Strength
(W6,7) Deformability and Strength
(W8) Mid-term Exam
(W9,10) Identify Unstable Rock Slope 
(W11,12) Identify Unstable Rock Tunnel
(W13,14) Rock Engineering Support Design
(W15,16) Case Studies
(W17) End-term Exam
